English: Hey, do you come to Kowloon often?
Chinese: 喂，你是不是很常來Kowloon啊？
Korean: 저기, 넌 가끔 쿠롱에 오는 거야?
German: He, bist du eigentlich oft in Kowloon?

English: I was thinking earlier...
Chinese: 我之前就在想了……
Korean: 얼마 전에도 생각했던 건데…
German: Ich habe mir vorhin überlegt ...

English:
The one thing that really struck me after coming
here was how dangerous hackers really are.
Chinese:
話說回來……我到這裡來，才真正感覺到，
駭客真的非常非常危險。
Korean:
게다가… 이곳에 와 보고서, 엄청 실감했거든
해커는, 역시 꽤 위험한 느낌이 들어
German:
Mir ist hier wirklich klar geworden, wie
gefährlich Hacker eigentlich sind.

English: I'm so glad you came along when you did.
Chinese: 還好有你陪我一起來……
Korean: 네가 옆에 있어 줘서, 정말 다행이야…
German:
Ich bin so froh, dass du rechtzeitig aufgetaucht
bist.

English: Ack, whoa!
Chinese: 呃……唔哇啊啊？
Korean: …어, 우와햐악!?
German: Ah, huch!

English: Yikes, did you see something over there just now?
Chinese: 剛剛剛剛才那裡是不是有東西？
Korean: 지지지, 지금 저쪽에 뭔가 있지 않았어?
German: Hilfe, hast du da drüben gerade etwas gesehen?

English:
You saw it, right? You had to have seen it!
I just caught a glimpse of it, but it was there!
Chinese:
你有看到嗎？　你有看到吧？
雖然只有一瞬間，但是我有看到！
Korean:
봤, 지? 봤잖아!?
언뜻 본 거지만, 나, 봤는걸!
German:
Du hast das gesehen, oder? Ganz bestimmt!
Es war nur ganz kurz da, aber es war da!

English:
Don't tell me there was nothing there!
It was absolutely there! I swear I'm not lying!
Chinese:
你說沒有……？怎麼可能沒有？
一定！一定有啦！我沒說謊！
Korean:
…어, 없었다니… 그럴 리 없어!
분명, 분명 있었어! 거짓말 아니야!
German:
Sag mir nicht, dass da nichts war!
Da war sehr wohl was! Ich lüge bestimmt nicht!

English: It was there!
Chinese: 明明就有！！
Korean: 있었잖아!!
German: Da war etwas!

English: I saw it!
Chinese: 我親眼看到了！！
Korean: 봤는걸!!
German: Ich hab’s gesehen!

English:
What did it look like?
Where did it go?
Chinese:
是什麼樣子？什麼形狀？
那個東西往哪裡去了？
Korean:
어떤 모습, 형태였어?
어디로 갔어?
German:
Wie hat es denn ausgesehen?
Wo ist es denn hin?

English:
What? Well, I... It was just for a second, so I
don't know the size or shape, but, but...
Chinese:
嗯？嗯……因為只有一瞬間，所以我沒看清楚大小和形狀……
呃……可是！可是！
Korean:
에? 아니, 그… 순식간이라 크기라든지
형태까지는… 그… 아니, 하지만하지만!?
German:
Wie? Es war nur eine Sekunde lang da, also
habe ich kaum etwas erkannt ...

English: Where was it? Where did it go?
Chinese: 在哪裡？往哪裡去了？
Korean: 어디 있었어? 어디로 갔어?
German:
Wo war es denn?
Wo ist es hin?

English:
So I was over there and it was there. Wait...
No, I was here and it was there, right?
Chinese:
所以說，就在那裡，往那邊去……咦……？
好像在這裡，往這邊去了呢……嗯？
Korean:
그러니까, 저쪽에 있었는데, 저쪽으로… 어…?
여기 있었는데, 그쪽이었… 나~?
German:
Ich war also hier drüben und es war dort.
Warte ... Ich war hier und es war dort, oder?

English: I was so scared I guess I plum forgot. Hee hee!
Chinese: 我……我好像嚇到忘記了……嘿嘿♪
Korean: 너, 너무 무서워서, 까먹은 것 같아~… 데헷♪
German:
Ich hatte wohl solche Angst, dass ich es sofort
vergessen habe. Hihi!

English:
Hey, come on. Don't give me that look.
I don't need your pity.
Chinese:
討、討厭啦……
別用那種眼神看我，好像我很可憐似的……
Korean:
시, 싫다… 그런, 애처로운 걸 보는 듯한 눈으로
바라 보지 말아 줘…
German:
He, nicht doch. Schau mich nicht so an.
Ich kann kein Mitleid gebrauchen.

English:
But really! I really saw it! Or... I mean I'm
pretty sure I did...
Chinese:
可是可是可是！我是真的看到了！
好像……是吧……
Korean:
하지만하지만하지만! 정말로 봤어! …그런
…느낌이…드는데…
German:
Aber ganz im Ernst! Ich habe es wirklich gesehen!
Zumindest ... glaube ich das ...

English: Did I really just imagine it?
Chinese: 還、還是我的錯覺……？是嗎？
Korean: …여, 역시 기분 탓이야? 내 착각?
German: Habe ich mir das wirklich nur eingebildet?

English:
Well, let's just say it was that, then.
If you're willing to go with me on that!
Chinese:
那就當作是這樣……？
只要你可以接受就好～
Korean:
…뭐, 뭐 그렇다면, 그런 걸로 해 줘도 괜찮을까~
라던가? 네가 납득한다면, 말이지~
German:
Dann sagen wir einfach, dass es so war.
Wenn du mir da zustimmst!

English:
Yes, I totally overreacted.
I'm sorry for causing a commotion.
Chinese:
嗯，是我太膽小了。
抱歉給你添麻煩了……
Korean:
…네, 제가 너무 쫄았습니다
폐를 끼쳐 버렸습니다, 죄송합니다…
German:
Ja, ich habe total überreagiert.
Tut mir leid, dass ich so ein Tamtam veranstaltet
habe.

English:
Kowloon has this sort of dangerous vibe to it.
How can I put it? It's just weird, or something.
Chinese:
Kowloon是個非常危險的地方吧？
應該說讓人覺得不太舒服……
Korean:
쿠롱은, 왠지 위험한 그게 느껴진단 말이지…
기분 나쁘다고 할까, 뭐라고 할까…
German:
Kowloon wirkt einfach irgendwie gefährlich.
Wie soll ich das sagen? Es ist einfach komisch.
